resources.string: Thank you for trying Droid Nim!

On your turn, select a droid standing in the groups on the right. The leftmost droid will deactivate it and all droids between them. Then your opponent selects a position. Whoever takes the last of the droids on the right wins. You can find more information via the “Help” item in the menu (a question mark).
